title: Taba11y
creator: Peter Gould
description: Taba11y is a free Chrome extension which calculates the tab order of all elements on a web page and displays it visually, either by drawing a path or by highlighting the elements. It makes it easy to check that all required elements are tabbable and in a logical order.
guideline: WCAG 2.1 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.1
WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
<abbr title="Web Content Accessibility Guidelines">WCAG</abbr> 1.0 — <abbr title="World Wide Web Consortium">W3C</abbr> Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0
